title: Scapular, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: tapestry weave
dimensions: H x W: 61 x 6 cm (24 x 2 3/8 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Two silk green ribbons attached to square end pieces mounted on brown wool. Each square is woven in gold and green. On one is a sacred monogram, and on the other, a crown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scapular, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: tapestry weave. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-58-15.
